attributes.title: My grandpa was murdered from this app
attributes.review: I got this app, as a conservative republican, and I first got spammed with FAKE NEWS. It had me put in my number and got a bunch of calls and texts. I should have realized that was a RED FLAG, but then there were a bunch of wavers and terms and conditions. So I just clicked on all of them, then agreed to the Trump Administration to murder my grandfather, who happens to be 84 years old. And I didnâ€™t realize until the next morning when he was found dead. It was all my fault just because of this app.

attributes.title: Worst app!
attributes.review: When I tried to download the app my phone legit restarted! And, when I finally was able to browse the app, it just kept glitching out! 10/10 would not recommend for download. Iâ€™m very disappointed.
